title: Hawk in Flight (Habicht im Fluge) (in-text plate, page 19) from Tierfabeln des Aesop (Aesop's Fables)
medium: One from an illustrated book with thirty-five woodcuts (including woodcut cover, title page and ornamental initials)
dimensions: composition (irreg.): 1 7/16 x 2" (3.6 x 5.1 cm); page: 13 x 9 1/16" (33 x 23 cm)
